data.title: S.W. Brown & Son Funeral Home, INC.
data.text:
Welcome

We are not affiliated with any corporations that operate a large number of funeral homes. We are a family owned and operated business who treat all of our families as individuals, not numbers. It is within this framework of an honored tradition that we continue to serve our families past, present, and future.

We gladly answer inquiries regarding current services, pre-planning or any other questions that you may have during our extensive daytime office hours and always promptly and personally respond 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year to assist you when a death has occurred.

MISSION STATEMENT:

“To celebrate the significance of a life lived, by facilitating meaningful ways for family, and friends, to honor the memory of their loved one. We treat each family with the same respect and dignity, as we would afford our own family during their time of need. We do this by providing education, options, and guidance with the utmost level of ethics, professionalism, courtesy and compassion. Our high standards have been instilled in our daily practice that have been carried on for generations.”

Ne w Please like us and feel free to share your experience on Google
